messages.subject: Kodogu Commercial Message
messages.msgSnippet: List, I have posted some tsuba, Nishigaki f/k, and Mino menuki for sale on the Nihonto Message Board. Click on FOR SALE file for image:
messages.messageBody:
List,

I have posted some tsuba, Nishigaki f/k, and Mino
menuki for sale on the Nihonto Message Board. Click on
FOR SALE file for image:

http://www.militaria.co.za/nihontomessageboard/viewtopic.php?t=1759

or Tinyurl:

http://tinyurl.com/3ahzxa

Anyone interested, please contact me offline for
questions or more photos. Thank you for your time.


Curran



____________________________________________________________________________________
